title: FyneWav
short: A music creation software, completely free and open-source!
description: FyneWaz is a music creation software, completely free and open-source!
It is currently in development, but you can already try it out by downloading the source code and compiling it yourself!
This application is made using C++ and the OpenAL library for the core engine, and HTML/CSS/JavaScript for the GUI (using electron).
The source code is available on GitHub (link below) if you want to check it out or contribute to the project!
